room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Escape Room Cleveland in Cleveland
room_description:
World famous thief, Johnny Ladro is putting together a special team for one last heist and he plans on going out with a bang! Ladro owes money to the wrong people and after this mission, he plans on enjoying a quiet life away from crime.
You and your crewâ€™s target is the famous Louvre museum in Paris. Ladro has a connection inside that will help you bypass security. The problem is, you only have a 1-hour window to complete the heist! Billions of dollars in ancient artifacts. One hour to get in, get the goods and get out! Get ready for the heist of a lifetime!
